------=_Part_1332233_1158216789.1437671384469
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

 I just picked up a sword in fair shape dated showa 20 February in 1944 arm=
y mounts with 2 hole tang.=C2=A0=C2=A0 It is missing the saya upper fitting=
 and the tsuka lower fitting - the ones that have the clasp that holds the =
sword in the saya.=C2=A0=C2=A0 These would have been black color.=C2=A0=C2=
=A0 Anyone know where I can get these?=C2=A0=C2=A0 I am on vacation in Mont=
ana and away from all my references.=C2=A0=C2=A0 I will NOT put repro fitti=
ngs on an original even though it is a seki stamped gunto.=C2=A0=C2=A0 This=
 one appears to have a gifu chimata stamp as well.=C2=A0=C2=A0 Please reply=
 to my off list address as I am on the road with little bandwidth to keep c=
hecking the list.
Dennis
